meta_description: Welcome to the Bosque Museum website. The Bosque Museum is a small 501c3 non-profit museum dedicated to preserving the history of Bosque County, Texas.
hours_text:
###### PO Box 345

###### 301 S Ave Q

###### Clifton, TX 76634

###### (254) 675-3845

###### [info@bosquemuseum.org](mailto:info@bosquemuseum.org?subject=Website Inquiry)

###### [///credibly.progressed.fight](https://what3words.com/credibly.progressed.fight)

General Admission: $5

Children under 10: Free

Members: Free

[Group rates available](https://www.bosquemuseum.org/copy-of-education)

#### Find Us

We're Open:

10a-5p CST

Thursday - Saturday

12p - 5p CST

Sunday

​

  * [](http://www.facebook.com/bosquemuseum)
  * [](http://www.twitter.com/bosquemuseum)
  * [](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrjtklZ1GgtYIhO3opggCYA)

###### Driving Directions

From Austin: Take I-35 north to the Hwy 317 exit at Belton, left on Hwy 317 through Belton, Moody, McGregor, and Crawford to Hwy 6 in Valley Mills, left on Hwy 6 to Clifton.

From Dallas: Take I-35E south to the US 77 exit at Hillsboro, right on Hwy 77 to Hwy 22 in Hillsboro, right on Hwy 22 through Whitney and past Whitney Dam to FM219, left on FM219 to Clifton.

From Fort Worth (east): Take I-35W south to the Hwy 174 exit at Burleson, through Burleson, Cleburne, Rio Vista, and Morgan to to Hwy 22 in Meridian, right on Hwy 22 to Hwy 6, left on Hwy 6 to Clifton.

From Fort Worth (west): Take US 377 south to Granbury, left on Hwy 144 through Glen Rose and Walnut Springs to Hwy 22 in Meridian, right on Hwy 22 to Hwy 6, left on Hwy 6 to Clifton.

From Waco: Take Hwy 6 north to Clifton.

## Welcome

###### Mission Statement:

###### The Bosque Museum is dedicated to protect and preserve Bosque County’s historic and prehistoric resources for the use, education, enjoyment, and economic benefit of the public it serves.

###### ​

###### Vision Statement:

###### As we become a nationally acclaimed museum through innovative programming, curatorial excellence, and an enriching visitor experience, we will work...
